generalRequirements: You must deposit at least {{amount}} tokens to chat.

rainInfoModal.heading: Chat Rain
rainInfoModal.description: Chat rain tokens are distributed to all. Boost your share by doing the following:

list.item1: Play. The higher your XP gained in the last 7 days, the higher your share.
list.item2: Level Up. The higher your level, the higher your share.
list.item3: Deposit at least 20 tokens in the last 30 days.
list.item4: Wager at least 1,000 tokens in the last 30 days

rainInfoModal.requirements: To join the rain, you must meet the following requirements:

requirementsList.item1: Wager at least {{value.wager}} tokens in the last 7 days.
requirementsList.item2: Wager at least 1x your previous rain payout.

earnModal.heading: Invite friends, earn tokens!
earnModal.description: Share your referral link and earn FREE tokens from every friend that signs up!

chatRulesModal.heading: Chat Rules
chatRulesModal.description: Learn more about our chat rules. Any behaviour against rules might be banned.

rulesList.item1: Don't spam & don't use excessive capital letters when chatting.
rulesList.item2: Don't harass or be offensive to other users or Stake staff.
rulesList.item3: Don't share any personal information (including socials) of you or other players.
rulesList.item4: Don't beg or ask for loans, rains or tips.
rulesList.item5: Don't use alternative (alts) accounts on chat, that is strictly forbidden.
rulesList.item6: No suspicious behavior that can be seen as potential scams.
rulesList.item7: Don't engage in any forms of advertising/trading/selling/buying or offering services.

tipModal.heading: Tip User
tipModal.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to send {{value.username}} {{value.amount}} tokens?

blockModal.heading: Block User
blockModal.description: ¿Are you sure you want to block {{value.username}}?

unblockModal.heading: Unblock User
unblockModal.description: ¿Are you sure you want to block {{value.username}}?
